author: yslai
body:
A change to implement two features:

(a) A "fall-back" mode, when no calibration information is available, that estimates the UE from the same event using a close approximation of the ATLAS algorithm [Physics Letters B 719, 220241 (2013)]. This mode is not turned on by default.

(b) Flags to expose the Fourier orders that are going to be subtracted. This was inadvertently hard-coded before.

The changes are merged due to otherwise conflicting diffs.

Issues raised previously from Carl Vuosalo's review are already addressed here.
title: Heavy ion Vs algorithm same event subtraction
